data.meta_description: Learn more about the Bitter Jester Foundation for the Arts (BJFA), The Comic Thread, and the Bitter Jester Music Festival. — Mobile stage rental - rent our mobile stage for festivals, fairs, concerts, events, block parties, and more!
data.meta_site_name: Bitter Jester Foundation for the Arts, NFP
data.text:
About BJFA:

The Bitter Jester Foundation for the Arts (BJFA) is a 501(c)(3) not-for-profit charitable organization based in Illinois with operations in Illinois. BJFA was established in January, 2016 but its programming has been running since 1998.

Mission Statement:

The Bitter Jester Foundation for the Arts (BJFA) promotes the benefits of the arts to the public and fosters economic growth through original music and theatrical productions that unite diverse artists, audiences, and local businesses. BJFA’s flagship music festival empowers youth at a critical time in their personal and artistic development by providing unparalleled educational, hands-on learning, and peer networking opportunities unavailable elsewhere.

BJFA Programs:
